--- mattwo7 <Matfour@...> wrote:

> TBH I only have 2 questions, why is Dinobot a pred and what is with
> all the factions?

Hello :)

As to why Dinobot is a Pred, I will leave that to the player who
controls that character.

As to the factions, I will try to explain it, and will let others
correct me as they see fit! :)

As I see it you generally have two standard factions (well 3 but we
will get to that later) - Maximals and Predicons. The Autobots have the
basic ethos of "Peace is the right of all sentient beings" while the
Decepticons are about "Peace through tyranny!" or "Might makes right!".
However there are variations on each theme. 

If you look at the Wiki site (which I encourage you to do) under the
subsection summary and setting which kind of gives you a break down. 

(I have grafted these from the site. please read them there in their
entirety)

You have at least two versions of predacon : BUSHIDO PREDACONS who
believe that preserving the peace will allow them to grow strong for
the little while they still have before the Minions start an all-out
war. their leader is Spire. And IRON SKULL PREDACONS who believe that
Maximals are weak and they would rather take over the lead from the
Maximals and act right now. Their leader is Jotunn.

You also have at least two versions of Maximal: PACIFICUS MAXIMALSwho
believe that peace is the only way everybody can focus on the efforts
against the Minions. Their leader is Perseus. While you also have the
SILVER WINGS MAXIMALS who are convinced that the Predacons are
preparing a revolution and that they want to prepare a strike against
them. They think they should take them all out before things get rough.
Their leader is Razorwing.

Then there are THE WATCHERS who look to me to still be Maximals but 
take in members from other factions like Predacons. This faction is
dedicated to the monitoring of the Minions. They are crafty and swift,
and they are renowned Minion-killers at times. Their skills also
include diplomacy, however, as members of any factions can join the
Watchers. Their leader is Elder. 

Then there are the Minions of Unicron, generally called either Minions
or Unicronians. Their apparent goal is to turn the Earth into a ripe
feeding ground for Unicron. Unicron realizing that the energon present
on Earth was too powerful for him to absorb right away, left minions
behind to keep an eye on Earth until the crystals were ripe for his
taking. (Remember how the crystals originally interfered with Maximals
& Predacons, and they couldn't stay in robot mode?) Up until recently a
sort of Cold War was raging between the Unicronians and the
Cybertronians however with the arrival of Cyclonus, Scourge and the
sweeps, and the addition of several new warriors this cold war
threatens to explode into something more. They are led by Vorpal, a
powerful villain who's full abilities have yet to be revealed.

I hope this helps, and I am sure the others will give corrections and
expansions as well. Also Please read what is on the Wiki site, and
explore the different links. There is ALOT of information there -
Pictures of some of the bases, who leads, facts about the characters,
the history and much more. 

Preston
